short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launches a new tab with the currently selected game's achievement list on TrueAchievements.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to highlight text anywhere on a webpage and brings you to the TrueAchievements webpage regarding this text! For example, if you come across a 'NBA 2k21' YouTube video, you can select highlight that game title and right click to bring you to the TrueAchievements page for NBA 2k21!
